content: I do not have personal opinions or beliefs, but i can say that the issues that are being overlooked in popular music depend on the cultural, political and social context of each country or region. however, some people argue that in recent years, popular music has focused heavily on romantic relationships, partying, and materialism, while neglecting other important issues such as mental health, income inequality, and police brutality. however, there are still many musicians who use their platform to raise awareness and promote positive change in society, and there are always new artists emerging with fresh perspectives and important messages to share.
